translations.intro2: Timeless Stories of El Salvador V2: Epiphany
translations.intro3: The 2nd volume of Timeless Stories of El Salvador. A new book full of epic adventures that teleports you to the past of El Salvador. Enjoy 31 new fully illustrated folkloric legends and fairytales.
translations.author1: is a Salvadoran Innovator and traveler who is on the quest to create a better world through technology. Also, he wants to recreate the Salvadoran perspective through folklore.
translations.author2: His professional career has been around IT. However, as an immigrant living in Poland and Spain, he discovered all the negative biases surrounding his homeland, El Salvador. The main reason was the lack of available information in other languages like English, Czech, German, Polish, etc. This situation motivated him to create the first series of Salvadoran folkloric books in English.
translations.author3: Each book contains 31 stories that have been shared orally for hundreds of years like Sir Francis Drake arriving with his Golden Hind and hiding a small treasure in Meanguera Island and the twins whom a Shaman transformed into the Cadejos because of their antics.
translations.author4: As a person, he believes that everyone should be their own heroes. He shares with everyone he meets that the only person who can reshape their destiny is the one they see in the mirror daily. Dare to be your own hero TODAY.
